name: Salesforce AI Developer - Agentforce Implementation
description:
ProUnity est le point de contact unique (SPOC) pour cette mission. Si vous avez des questions, vous pouvez contacter Musli Muslija, Client Satisfaction Manager, par e-mail à paradigm@pro-unity.com 

_________________________  

La STIB souhaite initier un Proof of Concept (POC) autour de l’intelligence artificielle appliquée à son environnement Salesforce Service Cloud (Agentforce).

Le développeur Salesforce AI participera à la mise en œuvre du Proof of Concept Agentforce, en développant les composants IA, automatisations et intégrations nécessaires à la solution.

Objectifs de la mission :

· Implémenter les cas d’usage IA dans l’environnement Salesforce.

· Garantir la performance et la maintenabilité des développements.

· Collaborer avec l’AI Expert et l’Analyste fonctionnel pour assurer la cohérence du POC.

Tâches et compétences générales

  • Développer et configurer les fonctionnalités Agentforce.
  • Intégrer des prompts, actions et flows IA dans Salesforce Service Cloud.
  • Créer et optimiser les automatisations via Flow et Apex.
  • Participer aux tests unitaires et intégration en sandbox.
  • Rédiger la documentation technique et assurer le support post-livraison.

Compétences techniques propres à la mission

    • Excellente maîtrise de Salesforce Apex, LWC, Flow Builder.
    • Connaissance des outils IA Salesforce : Prompt Builder, Copilot Builder, Einstein GPT.
    • Expérience avec Data Cloud et API REST/SOAP.
    • Bonne compréhension de l’intégration multi-système et des modèles de données CRM.

Informations additionnelles:

La mission peut être reconduite pour une durée maximale (durée initiale comprise) de : 880 jours ouvrables.

skillSeniorityAnswers.label: No experience
skillSeniorityAnswers.description: No level of competence - no work experience in this skill area (academic knowledge)

skillSeniorityAnswers.label: Beginner
skillSeniorityAnswers.description: Limited work experience within this area. Candidate is expected to need help when performing this skill (between 1-3 years)

skillSeniorityAnswers.label: Intermediate
skillSeniorityAnswers.description: Candidate is able to successfully complete tasks in this competency as requested. Help from an expert may be required from time to time, but you can usually perform the skill independently (between 4-6 years)

skillSeniorityAnswers.label: Advanced
skillSeniorityAnswers.description: Candidate can perform the actions associated with this skill without assistance and recognized "a person to ask" when difficult questions arise regarding this skill (between 7-9 years)

skillSeniorityAnswers.label: Expert
skillSeniorityAnswers.description: Candidate is known as an expert in this area. Able to provide guidance, troubleshoot and answer questions related to this area of expertise and the field where the skill is used (10 years or more)

languageLevelAnswers.label: Elementary proficiency
languageLevelAnswers.description: Can understand and use familiar everyday phrases and answer basic questions about personal details. Not able to cope with basic professional situations

languageLevelAnswers.label: Limited working proficiency
languageLevelAnswers.description: Can communicate and able to cope with basic professional situations

languageLevelAnswers.label: Professional working proficiency
languageLevelAnswers.description: Can function productively in business settings. Can understand verbal and written communications and express themselves; however, fine shades of meaning may escape them

languageLevelAnswers.label: Full professional proficiency
languageLevelAnswers.description: Comfortable with technical terms and nuanced professional discussion. Can use the language flexibly and accurately for professional purposes

languageLevelAnswers.label: Native or bilingual proficiency
languageLevelAnswers.description: Can interact with ease and skill similar to native speaker, differentiating finer shades of meaning for professional purposes
